component.name: Freeciv gtk+-3 modpack installer
component.summary: Gtk+-3 based modpack installer for the Freeciv game

description.p: Freeciv is a Free and Open Source empire-building strategy game inspired by the history of human civilization. The game commences in prehistory and your mission is to lead your tribe from the Stone Age to the Space Age...
Freeciv modpack utility can be used to automatically download and install custom rulesets, tilesets, soundsets, and maps for freeciv to use.
